metadata.Name: JMultiWOZ
metadata.Description: JMultiWOZ is a large-scale, Japanese multi-domain task-oriented dialogue dataset. It is based on the MultiWOZ dataset and contains dialogues in multiple domains, such as restaurants, hotels, attractions, trains, taxis, and hospitals.
metadata.Paper Title: JMultiWOZ: A Large-Scale Japanese Multi-Domain Task-Oriented Dialogue Dataset
metadata.Abstract: We present JMultiWOZ, a large-scale Japanese multi-domain task-oriented dialogue dataset. JMultiWOZ is created based on the MultiWOZ dataset and contains 12,000 dialogues in six domains: restaurants, hotels, attractions, trains, taxis, and hospitals. We introduce a new annotation scheme for Japanese dialogue and provide detailed statistics of the dataset. We also conduct preliminary experiments on dialogue state tracking and dialogue policy learning to demonstrate the usefulness of JMultiWOZ. The dataset is publicly available at https://huggingface.co/datasets/jmultiwoz.
